history.proof: intros A P. unfold inclusion. intros x y. reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (P : relation A), inclusion A P full_relation

Premises:
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
inclusion : forall A : Type, relation A -> relation A -> Prop
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For Cj: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For D: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF
clos_rt_clos_rst : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl_trans A R) (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)
clos_r_clos_rt : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl A R) (clos_refl_trans A R)
clos_rt_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl_trans A (clos_refl_trans A R)) (clos_refl_trans A R)
clos_rst_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl_sym_trans A (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)) (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)
ssrbool.AltTrue : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), P -> ssrbool.alt_spec P b true
rt1n_ind_right : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> Prop) (z : A), P z -> (forall x y : A, R x y -> clos_refl_trans_1n A R y z -> P y -> P x) -> forall x : A, clos_refl_trans_1n A R x z -> P x
clos_refl_trans_ind_right : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> Prop) (z : A), P z -> (forall x y : A, R x y -> P y -> clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P x) -> forall x : A, clos_refl_trans A R x z -> P x
BinNat.N.peano_rect_succ : forall (P : BinNums.N -> Type) (a : P BinNums.N0) (f : forall n : BinNums.N, P n -> P (BinNat.N.succ n)) (n : BinNums.N), BinNat.N.peano_rect P a f (BinNat.N.succ n) = f n (BinNat.N.peano_rect P a f n)
clos_refl_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, clos_refl A R x a -> P a
clos_refl_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, clos_refl A R x a -> P a
full_relation = fun (A : Type) (_ _ : A) => True : forall A : Type, relation A Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scope is [type_scope]
clos_refl_trans_ind_left : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), P x -> (forall y z : A, clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P y -> R y z -> P z) -> forall z : A, clos_refl_trans A R x z -> P z

clos_refl_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> clos_refl_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_refl_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
clos_refl_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> clos_refl_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_refl_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
clos_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
clos_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
clos_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_trans A R x a -> P x a
clos_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_trans A R x a -> P x a

clos_refl_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P x y -> clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, clos_refl_trans A R x a -> P x a

Variant alt_spec (P : Prop) (b : bool) : bool -> Set := AltTrue : P -> ssrbool.alt_spec P b true | AltFalse : is_true (negb b) -> ssrbool.alt_spec P b false For AltTrue: Argument P is implicit For AltFalse: Argument b is implicit For alt_spec: Argument scopes are [type_scope bool_scope bool_scope] For AltTrue: Argument scopes are [type_scope bool_scope _] For AltFalse: Argument scopes are [type_scope bool_scope _]

clos_rst_is_equiv : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), equivalence A (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)

rt_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_trans A R x x
rtn1_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x x
